items.content_text: Shoutout to this conference’s registration page for being gender-inclusive
New favorite t-shirt in my collection
The shelf so far (featuring a bit of tea)
Some gorgeous clouds this morning

This is my first official Saturday of grad school, which means that I spent about 6 hours today reading part of the Odyssey Book 9 in Greek, then went out for groceries, and made this salad. Next I’m going to put together a chair.

Life is good 😄
Sunrise: beginning and in-progress

This was possibly the most carefully I have ever driven

(Picture of a mattress and box spring tied to the top of my car)

I received a slightly frosty welcome from one of my new roommates

(Image of Nyx, a small black cat perched atop some cabinets)
I’m gonna miss this guy when I’m in Texas

Sunrise with egrets

(From this morning’s run)
I see what’s going on here
Good to see that the janitorial staff knows what’s going on
Taking myself out to ice cream (accompanied by my current book)
Accidentally took the dog on a 3 mile hike this morning and found this old car in the middle of the woods
Scored a cool poster at work today
So far Space Opera is every bit as hilarious as it’s billed to be 📚
A couple pictures from the end of this morning’s run
Not pictured: insects chirping, birdsong, babbling brooks, my stupidly massive grin at how gorgeous today is
Looks like I’m trapped here for the foreseeable future
It’s pretty even when it’s raining
I find this weirdly calming
The speed limit here is 80
Actually barking at his own shadow
Apricot + gingerbread + extra bitter cocoa
This country has nice sunsets

I want to steal this pool and bring it back to Carleton
I could be happy here
